Devex Design Process

Shaping the process of a product team through design leadership and cross-collaboration.

2023 UX Strategy

The Challenge

As Devex grew, the design team faced challenges with an unclear design process and lack of collaboration between teams. This led to inconsistent user experiences and inefficient workflows.

The Approach

I initiated a comprehensive review of our design process, focusing on collaboration points and identifying key areas for improvement:

  • Conducted stakeholder interviews across product, engineering, and business teams
  • Mapped current processes and identified pain points
  • Developed and tested new collaborative approaches with real projects
  • Established clear documentation templates for design decisions

The Outcome

The new design process improved cross-team collaboration and led to significant improvements:

  • Design implementation time reduced by 35%
  • Cross-team collaboration increased significantly
  • Design consistency improved across all products
  • Clear documentation processes established for future work
